item.title: 米其林质疑欧盟寻找轮胎卡特尔证据
item.description: 米其林正在质疑欧盟反垄断机构对其设施进行突击检查的合法性，因为监管机构在整个轮胎行业寻找涉嫌操纵价格卡特尔的证据。【原文：Michelin is challenging the legality of European Union antitrust raids on its facilities as regulators swept across the tire industry for evidence of a suspected price-fixing cartel.】

item.title: 西班牙公用事业公司 Naturgy 的股票在收购报道中停牌
item.description: 在媒体连续两天报道阿布扎比投资者可能竞购西班牙天然气和电力公司 Naturgy Energy Group 之后，该公司暂停交易。【原文：Trading of Naturgy Energy Group, a Spanish gas and power firm, was suspended following two days of media reports on a potential bid by an Abu Dhabi-based investor.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，东芝将裁员 5000 人，这是东芝重组的最新举措
item.description: 日经新闻》（Nikkei）周三称，东芝公司计划在日本裁员 5000 人，约占其国内员工总数的十分之一，以削减成本并专注于基础设施和数字技术业务。【原文：Toshiba Corp. plans to cut 5,000 jobs in Japan, or roughly a tenth of its domestic headcount, in a bid to cut costs and focus on its infrastructure and digital technology operations, the Nikkei said Wednesday.】

item.title: 马航寻求减轻中东航线飞机负荷
item.description: 伊朗上周末对以色列的袭击迫使航空公司不得不绕道而行，马来西亚航空公司将暂时停止在吉隆坡飞往伦敦的客机上运送货物。【原文：Malaysia Airlines will temporarily stop carrying cargo on its passenger flights from Kuala Lumpur to London after Iran’s attack on Israel over the weekend forced airlines to make lengthy detours.】

item.title: 阿什莫尔逆流而上，大举押注中国而非印度
item.description: 总部位于伦敦的资产管理公司阿什莫尔集团（Ashmore Group PLC）正在减少对印度股票的投资，并将中国列为其新兴市场基金的首选，理由是印度股市被过度炒作且过于拥挤，而中国股市将迎来反弹。【原文：London-based asset manager Ashmore Group PLC is reducing its exposure to Indian equities and has made China the #1 pick in its emerging-markets fund, arguing that India’s stock market is overhyped and overcrowded while China’s is set for a rebound.】

item.title: 南非通胀缓解，不太可能触发降息
item.description: 南非 3 月份的通胀率降至两个月来的最低点，但这不太可能说服决策者削减借贷成本，因为由于油价上涨和兰特再度疲软，预计通胀率的下降将是短暂的。【原文：South Africa’s inflation rate dipped to a two-month low in March, but that is unlikely to persuade policymakers to cut borrowing costs as the drop is expected to be short-lived because of rising oil prices and renewed rand weakness.】

item.title: 千禧年等对冲基金正在做空英国水务公司
item.description: 在泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）的危机凸显出整个行业的高债务水平后，包括千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）和箭街资本公司（Arrowstreet Capital）在内的对冲基金正在做空英国水务公司的资产。【原文：Hedge funds including Millennium Management and Arrowstreet Capital are shorting the assets of UK water companies after a crisis at Thames Water spotlighted high debt levels across the industry.】

item.title: 市场变化促使第一制药调整 2 190 亿美元的投资组合
item.description: 日本最大的上市人寿保险公司面临两难境地：传统的投资策略不起作用。【原文：Japan’s largest listed life insurer has a dilemma — its traditional investment strategies aren’t working.】

item.title: 全球监管机构希望让基金为追加保证金做好更充分的准备
item.description: 全球监管机构提出了一揽子措施，以确保对冲基金和银行业以外的其他投资者在市场紧张时能够更好地应对保证金和抵押品要求。【原文：Global regulators proposed a package of measures to ensure hedge funds and other investors from outside the banking sector are better able to cope with margin and collateral calls in times of market stress.】

item.title: 非洲超级富豪因经济困境而逃离非洲大陆
item.description: 过去十年间，生活在非洲的百万富翁人数减少了近两万人，因为非洲大陆的超级富豪要么搬走了，要么看到货币大幅贬值侵蚀了他们的财富。【原文：The number of millionaires living in Africa dropped by nearly 20,000 in the past decade as the continent’s ultra-rich either moved away or saw dramatic currency depreciations eat away at their wealth.】

item.title: 开斋节假期后印尼盾延续弱势格局
item.description: 本周印尼货币的暴跌延续了过去十年开斋节假期后的模式。【原文：This week’s slump in Indonesia’s currency has extended a pattern seen over the past decade following the Eid al Fitr holiday.】

item.title: 通胀数据火热，交易员青睐英国央行 2024 年仅降息一次
item.description: 在英国通胀放缓幅度低于预期之后，货币市场急于削减对英国央行今年货币宽松程度的押注。【原文：Money markets rushed to trim wagers on the extent of monetary easing by the Bank of England this year after UK inflation slowed less than expected.】

item.title: 欧洲科技股暴跌，ASML冲击高涨板块
item.description: 由于 ASML Holding NV 公布的订单量远低于分析师预期，科技股下跌，而大盘指数则徘徊不前。【原文：Technology stocks declined while the broader index treaded water, as ASML Holding NV reported orders well short of analyst expectations.】

item.title: 日本高管呼吁政府采取措施支撑日元
item.description: 东京商工会议所负责人表示，日本金融当局应考虑与其他国家协调进行货币干预，以支持日元。【原文：Japanese financial authorities should consider conducting coordinated currency intervention with other countries to support the yen, the head of the Tokyo Chamber of Commerce and Industry said.】

item.title: 芬奇同意以 12.7 亿英镑收购爱丁堡机场
item.description: Vinci 将以 12.7 亿英镑（16 亿美元）的价格收购爱丁堡机场的大部分股份，以扩大其控股范围。【原文：Vinci is buying a majority stake in the Edinburgh Airport for £1.27 billion ($1.6 billion), as it expands its range of holdings.】

item.title: 瑞银和野村争相向欧洲超级富豪销售利率产品
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）和野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：UBS Group AG and Nomura Holdings Inc. are making a push to sell sophisticated fixed-income products to the ultra wealthy in Europe, competing against firms such as BNP Paribas SA.】

item.title: 受里拉下跌影响的土耳其购物中心支持者寻求海外发展
item.description: 近年来，随着里拉汇率的急剧下跌，土耳其国内业务举步维艰，因此土耳其一家顶级购物中心开发商正寻求向海湾地区扩张。【原文：A top developer of Turkish shopping malls is eying an expansion into the Gulf as its domestic business has faltered alongside the lira’s precipitous decline in recent years.】

item.title: 中国万科寻求出售物流运营商普洛斯21.4%的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国万科集团正在寻求出售其在物流公司普洛斯私人有限公司（GLP Pte）的全部股份，因为这家国家支持的开发商正寻求积累现金以避免债务危机。【原文：China Vanke Co. is seeking to sell its entire stake in logistics firm GLP Pte, according to people familiar with the matter, as the state-backed developer seeks to amass cash to stave off a debt crisis.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦对卡扎甘石油公司的赔偿要求跃升至 1,500 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，哈萨克斯坦已将其对开发卡沙干油田的国际石油公司的仲裁索赔额提高到1500多亿美元，除成本纠纷外，还要求赔偿收入损失。【原文：Kazakhstan has increased its arbitration claims against international oil companies that developed the Kashagan oil field to more than $150 billion, demanding compensation for lost revenue in addition to a dispute over costs, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国退货数量飙升，奢侈品品牌受到冲击
item.description: 在去年11月中国最大的单日购物节期间，拉尔夫-劳伦公司（Ralph Lauren Corp.）、巴宝莉集团（Burberry Group Plc）和历峰集团（Cie Financiere Richemont SA）旗下的Net-A-Porter等高档品牌在中国大陆主要电子商务平台阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）的天猫（Tmall）上的购买量远远超过了一年前。【原文：During China’s biggest single-day shopping festival last November, upscale labels like Ralph Lauren Corp., Burberry Group Plc and Cie Financiere Richemont SA’s Net-A-Porter saw purchases far surpass those seen just a year earlier on the mainland’s dominant e-commerce platform, Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s Tmall.】

item.title: 外国投资者将结束对亚洲新兴市场股票的连续购买
item.description: 全球资金正从亚洲新兴市场撤出，连续五个月的股票购买热潮因美国降息预期减弱而告终。【原文：Global funds are retreating from emerging markets in Asia, with a five-month buying spree of stocks ending on scaled-down expectations for US rate cuts.】

item.title: 日本激进基金将在股东大会上要求大同公司首席执行官下台
item.description: 丸喜刚（Tsuyoshi Maruki）领导的激进基金战略资本公司（Strategic Capital Inc.【原文：Strategic Capital Inc., an activist fund led by Tsuyoshi Maruki, will push for the ouster of Daidoh Ltd.’s president after years of operating losses at the clothing manufacturer.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
item.description: 一位顾客在伦敦白教堂市场为农产品付款。摄影师：克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A customer pays for produce on Whitechapel market in London. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 阿联酋航空因天气原因在迪拜暂停办理登机手续至午夜
item.description: 由于迪拜的恶劣天气扰乱了世界上最繁忙的航空枢纽之一的旅行，阿联酋航空当天停止了所有乘客的登机手续办理。【原文：Emirates is halting all check-ins for passengers for the day as bad weather in Dubai disrupts travel in one of the busiest aviation hubs in the world.】

item.title: 泰国与新西兰恢复直航，提升两国关系
item.description: 泰国和新西兰两国领导人誓言在未来二十年内将双边贸易额增加两倍，在大流行病导致空中交通中断之后，两国已同意恢复直飞航班。【原文：Thailand and New Zealand have agreed to resume direct flights after the pandemic shut air connectivity as leaders of the two countries vowed to triple bilateral trade in the next two decades.】

item.title: 长期走高正将美元力量推向极限
item.description:
鲍威尔明确表示，美联储不会很快削减货币政策。美元正在扭转颓势，市场和其他央行无法跟上。【原文：

Powell makes clear that the Fed won’t cut soon. The dollar is turning the screws, and markets and other central banks can’t keep up.

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 冲突风险下亚洲天然气价格飙升接近今年最高水平
item.description: 亚洲液化天然气价格跃升至 1 月初以来的最高水平，因为人们担心以色列对伊朗上周末袭击的回应可能会演变成更大规模的冲突。【原文：Asian liquefied natural gas prices jumped to the highest level since early January amid anxiety that Israel’s response to Iran’s attack over the weekend may spiral into a wider conflict.】

item.title: LME表示正在观察市场，空头挤压担忧笼罩锡业
item.description: 从东南亚到非洲的供应断裂。人工智能的崛起。占据主导地位的 "大牛市"。本月锡价飙升后，这种强效鸡尾酒使一种经常被忽视的金属--锡面临空头挤压的风险。【原文：Supply ruptures from Southeast Asia to Africa. The rise of artificial intelligence. A “big bull” with a dominant position. This potent cocktail has put an often-overlooked metal, tin, at risk of a short squeeze after a price spike this month.】

item.title: 数据显示，瑞典住宅建设可能处于复苏边缘
item.description: 北欧最大国家瑞典的住房开工率显示，瑞典三十多年来最严重的住房建设低迷暂时结束了。【原文：Sweden’s worst slump in home construction in more than three decades is over for now, a gauge of housing starts in the largest Nordic nation suggests.】
